title: (x) Great Lengths swash capitals - Arabella {Mike Y}
content:
Can anyone ID the font on this logo? Thank you.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20070808064306im_/http:/typophile.com/files/gl.jpg)

 [‹ (x) "Beyond Swiss Tradition" Zurich Jazz Orchestra - Arbiter BQ {Claes Kallarsson}](http://web.archive.org/web/20070808064306/http:/typophile.com/node/19412 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) accessories. a short story. - Joanna {Matthew B} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20070808064306/http:/typophile.com/node/19415 "Go to next forum topic")
author: vector

comments.content:
The font looks like Arabella designed by A. Drescher (1936) (see Jaspert’s ’Encyclopaedia of Type Faces’). The ’L’ in the book is like the sample, but the sample’s G has an added flourish on the tail, compared to the showing in the book. This might have been an added detail.

- Mike Yanega
